page.title: 05Litter
page.content: It is a sad fact that people leave a lot of litter in and around our area. Paper,tins,bottles,polythene,wrappers, cigarette packets,paint tins etcetera are all found throughout the Forest. This type of pollution not only spoils the look of the Forest for other people but can be very dangerous to the animals that live in the Forest.{ {Broken Glass}can cut,{Polythene Bags} can suffocate animals, some ponies have died from{lead poisoning}as a result of licking old paint tins. More litter bins would help to reduce the problem but people have to be better educated to look after their beautiful countryside.
